sentences.en: A professor of emergency medicine at a major university sent me a really heartrending letter.
sentences.cn: 一所主要大学的一位急救医学教授曾给我写过一封令人伤心的信.

sentences.en: Don't you find it heartrending to see him get bullied like that?
sentences.cn: 看着他这样被捉弄,你不觉得心痛 吗 ?

sentences.en: heartrending stories of children being taken from their parents
sentences.cn: 关于孩子被人从父母身边夺走的悲伤故事

sentences.en: I'm loving you silently, but you do not know, I'm so heartrending and painful.
sentences.cn: 我在默默地爱你, 可是你不知道, 我很伤很痛.

sentences.en: It is really heartrending to see his own child sentenced.
sentences.cn: 看到自己的孩子被判刑真叫人伤心.

sentences.en: Please don't hurt me again, otherwise i'll heartrending hurt.
sentences.cn: 请你不要再来伤害我,我会难过, 心象被撕碎一样.

sentences.en: Should I really bid adieu to this summer? Notwithstanding how heartrending the sorrow of parting is.
sentences.cn: 真的该和夏说再见了么? 无论如何地,离愁依依?

words.tran_cn: 鼓舞人心的，令人振奋的

trans.tran_cn: 使人极度伤心的，令人悲痛的，回肠荡气，揪心
